channel.title: Is there anything good planned?
channel.description:
Well as the topic states, is there any good servers being worked on? I had to go away for a little bit when I left Project RSC was a few weeks old and was I was enjoying that alot, but now that I'm home I see that it's dead. I also remember something about RSCD before Luke passed wasn't sure if that was still being developed or not. Anyways, if there is any decent (preferably low rate) servers coming out I'd really love to hear about them. Even custom/PK servers that are actively developed with decent player base as I haven't found one yet. I logged on RSCE but that's really my last alternative here, unless they were to reset everything or something I can't play where the economy is so screwed, not really fun to be honest. Well I'd love to hear about up and comers or future projects, anything !
Cheers

item.title: Is there anything good planned?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

It’s all one big giant fucking secret.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there anything good planned?
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:5, topic:518531”][quote author=tigerclan link=topic=636796.msg4293250#msg4293250 date=1367730284]

I am working on a custom server based on mudclient 140, from scratch. Although I doubt it will get anywhere playable, at least in a decent amount of time. I work on it every now and then when I’m bored.

Today I was working on 3d graphics (all from scratch). Pretty happy with my results so far For the time being I am trying to figure out how to implement scanline rendering for triangles.
http://i.imgur.com/3T2mF3k.jpg

should just do it in javascript
[/quote]who are you, RSCShadow? Javascript is gay.[/quote]

by itself it is, but how could javascript inside of an html5 canvas with webgl be gay?

Read full topic

[quote=“Outspoken, post:6, topic:518531”]i see eclipse… i see the coad… i do not see gc() on loop. i am disappointed.[/quote]my codez aren’t as l33t as TX’s to include a infinite garbage collect loop.

item.title: Is there anything good planned?
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

Nah man, bunch of crap servers and RSCE only. I was working on a replica style server but the guy paying for it lost interest. Don’t think there’s much left for RSC.
